reviewText: THE EARLY YEARS OF LAW AND ORDER WERE SUPERLATIVE.GREAT COMPANY FOR OUR DINNER DATES FOR MY HEN AND I.

With George Dzundza murdered off of the show with the first season I nearly decided to stop watching the series. I always thought the arrogant Chris Noth was a better candidate to be murdered off of the show. Paul Sorvino was an able replacement for George Dzundza's character. One thing that was noticeable from the beginning was that just about every episode is very well written and acted with story-lines pulled right from news stories.
I always loved Law & Order.  I have seasons 1-15.

I was very happy to receive season 2.  It arrived quickly and the price was great.  I also received it in the format that I wanted.  Most sellers do not differentiate between the hard plastic case or the cardboard sleeve version.
Looking forward to collecting all the DVDs!!
This item was delivered quickly, and exactly.as described.
Great! Audio and Visual are well done!
If you are a true Law & Order fan, you'll really love these as seasons with Michael Moriarty are rarely if ever on reruns.  I hadn't seen these episodes for 15 years of so!
Great quality, can be played on multiple DVD rom units! Looks as being 480p resolution.
...very good - particularly like seeing Richard Brooks again... what a great character he plays and so well too.
Cut my cable but had to have my Law & Order.
